Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Game is our class representation of our poker game It holds all our poker components and handles rounds

    • Game

      public Game​(int ismall, int ibig, java.util.ArrayList<Player> iplayers, Server iserver)
      Constructor for our game class
      Parameters:
      ismall - small blind value
      ibig - big blind value
      iplayers - number of players
      iserver - the server to send messages to

      public int goAroundTable​(java.util.ArrayList<PlayerTuple> queue, int pot)
      Checking process for going around the table in a stage
      Parameters:
      queue - queue of the players
      pot - current pot
      Returns:
      returns current pot with added bets
